entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 07 February 2023
